languages.text: "Так что я оставил все, чем жил сам, чем жил мой род — а я потомственный офицер — и ввязался в эту невероятную авантюру. Лорд-капитан Теодора препоручила мне все заботы, которым сама не могла уделять время. Она могла подолгу пропадать со своим флагманом на дальних рубежах и в разведке, и все развитие протектората ложилось на мои плечи. И вдруг все, что строилось годами, затряслось, задрожало, как хлипкий ангар на сейсмически активном мире".

"So I left behind everything I had known, everything my family had known — I come from a long line of officers — and I embarked upon this incredibly reckless venture. Lord Captain Theodora entrusted me with all the concerns she had no time for. She would go off on her flagship for long periods, to distant frontiers, on scouting voyages, and the advancement of the entire protectorate rested on my shoulders. And then suddenly, everything that had been built over years and years began to quake, rattling like a flimsy hangar on a seismically active world."
languages.original_text: "Так что я оставил все, чем жил сам, чем жил мой род — а я потомственный офицер — и ввязался в эту невероятную авантюру. Лорд-капитан Теодора препоручила мне все заботы, которым сама не могла уделять время. Она могла подолгу пропадать со своим флагманом на дальних рубежах и в разведке, и все развитие протектората ложилось на мои плечи. И вдруг все, что строилось годами, затряслось, задрожало, как хлипкий ангар на сейсмически активном мире".

And then suddenly, everything that had been built over years and years began to quake, rattling like a flimsy hangar on a seismically active world."

languages.text: “因此，我舍弃了我原本所熟知的一切，抛开了我的家族所了解的一切。我离开了无数军官先人走过的道路，踏上了这场令人难以置信的鲁莽冒险之旅。西奥多拉领主舰长把她无暇顾及的所有问题都全权交给我负责。她会乘坐她的旗舰，前往遥远的边疆进行探索、航行。她会经年累月地不知去向，而整个王朝的管理工作都落在了我的肩上。随后突然之间，这么多年建立起来的所有规矩都开始摇晃，仿佛长年地震的世界中某个脆弱的机库一样岌岌可危。”
languages.original_text: "So I left behind everything I had known, everything my family had known — I come from a long line of officers — and I embarked upon this incredibly reckless venture. Lord Captain Theodora entrusted me with all the concerns she had no time for. She would go off on her flagship for long periods, to distant frontiers, on scouting voyages, and the advancement of the entire protectorate rested on my shoulders. And then suddenly, everything that had been built over years and years began to quake, rattling like a flimsy hangar on a seismically active world."

traits.locale_text: “因此，我舍弃了我原本所熟知的一切，抛开了我的家族所了解的一切。我离开了无数军官先人走过的道路，踏上了这场令人难以置信的鲁莽冒险之旅。西奥多拉领主舰长把她无暇顾及的所有问题都全权交给我负责。她会乘坐她的旗舰，前往遥远的边疆进行探索、航行。她会经年累月地不知去向，而整个王朝的管理工作都落在了我的肩上。随后突然之间，这么多年建立起来的所有规矩都开始摇晃，仿佛长年地震的世界中某个脆弱的机库一样岌岌可危。”

languages.text: «De modo que abandoné todo lo que había conocido; todo lo que mi familia había conocido, pues provengo de una larga línea de oficiales, y me embarqué en esta empresa increíblemente arriesgada. La Lord Capitán Theodora delegó en mí todos los asuntos para los que no tenía tiempo. Se marchaba en largos viajes en su nave insignia, a fronteras distantes y misiones de exploración, con lo que el progreso del protectorado al completo recaía sobre mí. Y, de repente, todo lo que se había construido durante décadas empezó a tambalearse, repiqueteando como un hangar endeble en un mundo sísmicamente activo».
languages.original_text: "So I left behind everything I had known, everything my family had known — I come from a long line of officers — and I embarked upon this incredibly reckless venture. Lord Captain Theodora entrusted me with all the concerns she had no time for. She would go off on her flagship for long periods, to distant frontiers, on scouting voyages, and the advancement of the entire protectorate rested on my shoulders. And then suddenly, everything that had been built over years and years began to quake, rattling like a flimsy hangar on a seismically active world."

traits.locale_text: «De modo que abandoné todo lo que había conocido; todo lo que mi familia había conocido, pues provengo de una larga línea de oficiales, y me embarqué en esta empresa increíblemente arriesgada. La Lord Capitán Theodora delegó en mí todos los asuntos para los que no tenía tiempo. Se marchaba en largos viajes en su nave insignia, a fronteras distantes y misiones de exploración, con lo que el progreso del protectorado al completo recaía sobre mí. Y, de repente, todo lo que se había construido durante décadas empezó a tambalearse, repiqueteando como un hangar endeble en un mundo sísmicamente activo».

languages.text: 「だから私は、それまで自分が知っていたこと、家族が知っていたこと…私は永きにわたる士官の家系に生まれたのです…そのすべてを捨てて、この信じられないほど無謀な冒険に乗り出したのです。ロード・キャプテン・テオドラは私に、彼女が時間をかけてはいられない心配事をすべて委ねました。彼女は長期間、旗艦に乗って遠くの辺境や偵察航海に出かけていましたから、保護領全体の発展は私の肩にかかっていました。そして突然、何年も何年もかけて築き上げてきたものすべてが揺れ始め、地震の多い世界の薄っぺらな格納庫のようにガタガタと音を立てはじめたのです」
languages.original_text: "So I left behind everything I had known, everything my family had known — I come from a long line of officers — and I embarked upon this incredibly reckless venture. Lord Captain Theodora entrusted me with all the concerns she had no time for. She would go off on her flagship for long periods, to distant frontiers, on scouting voyages, and the advancement of the entire protectorate rested on my shoulders. And then suddenly, everything that had been built over years and years began to quake, rattling like a flimsy hangar on a seismically active world."

traits.locale_text: 「だから私は、それまで自分が知っていたこと、家族が知っていたこと…私は永きにわたる士官の家系に生まれたのです…そのすべてを捨てて、この信じられないほど無謀な冒険に乗り出したのです。ロード・キャプテン・テオドラは私に、彼女が時間をかけてはいられない心配事をすべて委ねました。彼女は長期間、旗艦に乗って遠くの辺境や偵察航海に出かけていましたから、保護領全体の発展は私の肩にかかっていました。そして突然、何年も何年もかけて築き上げてきたものすべてが揺れ始め、地震の多い世界の薄っぺらな格納庫のようにガタガタと音を立てはじめたのです」

languages.text: "Also ließ ich alles zurück, was ich je gekannt hatte, alles, was meine Familie je gekannt hatte ... ich komme aus einer langen Linie von Offizieren ... und begab mich auf dieses unglaublich fahrlässige Abenteuer. Lord Captain Theodora überließ mir all die Aufgaben und Sorgen, für die sie keine Zeit hatte. Sie unternahm mit ihrem Flaggschiff oft lange Erkundungsmissionen zu entlegenen Grenzgebieten, und das Wohl des gesamten Protektorats lag auf meinen Schultern. Und dann, plötzlich, begann alles, was über Jahre und Jahre hinweg aufgebaut worden war, zu beben wie ein klappriger Hangar auf einer seismisch aktiven Welt."
languages.original_text: "So I left behind everything I had known, everything my family had known — I come from a long line of officers — and I embarked upon this incredibly reckless venture. Lord Captain Theodora entrusted me with all the concerns she had no time for. She would go off on her flagship for long periods, to distant frontiers, on scouting voyages, and the advancement of the entire protectorate rested on my shoulders. And then suddenly, everything that had been built over years and years began to quake, rattling like a flimsy hangar on a seismically active world."

traits.locale_text: "Also ließ ich alles zurück, was ich je gekannt hatte, alles, was meine Familie je gekannt hatte ... ich komme aus einer langen Linie von Offizieren ... und begab mich auf dieses unglaublich fahrlässige Abenteuer. Lord Captain Theodora überließ mir all die Aufgaben und Sorgen, für die sie keine Zeit hatte. Sie unternahm mit ihrem Flaggschiff oft lange Erkundungsmissionen zu entlegenen Grenzgebieten, und das Wohl des gesamten Protektorats lag auf meinen Schultern. Und dann, plötzlich, begann alles, was über Jahre und Jahre hinweg aufgebaut worden war, zu beben wie ein klappriger Hangar auf einer seismisch aktiven Welt."

languages.text: « Alors, j'ai tout quitté, tout ce que ma famille avait jamais connu, car je suis issu d'une longue lignée d'officiers... et je me suis embarqué dans cette aventure ô combien risquée. La seigneure-capitaine Théodora me déléguait toutes les tâches dont elle n'avait pas le temps de s'occuper. Elle partait pour de longues campagnes de reconnaissance dans les confins de l'univers à bord de son vaisseau amiral, et pendant ce temps, la bonne marche du protectorat tout entier reposait sur mes épaules. Jusqu'au jour où tout ce que nous avions construit au fil des années a commencé à vaciller, comme un vieux hangar désaffecté sur une planète volcanique. »
languages.original_text: "So I left behind everything I had known, everything my family had known — I come from a long line of officers — and I embarked upon this incredibly reckless venture. Lord Captain Theodora entrusted me with all the concerns she had no time for. She would go off on her flagship for long periods, to distant frontiers, on scouting voyages, and the advancement of the entire protectorate rested on my shoulders. And then suddenly, everything that had been built over years and years began to quake, rattling like a flimsy hangar on a seismically active world."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, j'ai tout quitté, tout ce que ma famille avait jamais connu, car je suis issu d'une longue lignée d'officiers... et je me suis embarqué dans cette aventure ô combien risquée. La seigneure-capitaine Théodora me déléguait toutes les tâches dont elle n'avait pas le temps de s'occuper. Elle partait pour de longues campagnes de reconnaissance dans les confins de l'univers à bord de son vaisseau amiral, et pendant ce temps, la bonne marche du protectorat tout entier reposait sur mes épaules. Jusqu'au jour où tout ce que nous avions construit au fil des années a commencé à vaciller, comme un vieux hangar désaffecté sur une planète volcanique. »

languages.text: "Bu yüzden ailem yerine koyduklarım da dâhil bildiğim her şeyi geride bıraktım. Atalarımın ataları dahi subaydı, bense bu akıl almaz maceraya girişmeyi seçtim. Lord Kaptan Theodora, uğraşmak için vakit bulamadığı tüm meselelerini bana emanet ederdi. Sancak gemisinin başında, uzaklarda, gözlem seferlerinde uzun günler geçirirdi. Koca protektoranın terakkisinden ben sorumluydum. Sonra bir gün, yıllar içinde inşa edilen on şey birden sallanmaya, aktif sismik dünyada zar zor ayakta duran birer bina gibi sarsılmaya başladı."
languages.original_text: "So I left behind everything I had known, everything my family had known — I come from a long line of officers — and I embarked upon this incredibly reckless venture. Lord Captain Theodora entrusted me with all the concerns she had no time for. She would go off on her flagship for long periods, to distant frontiers, on scouting voyages, and the advancement of the entire protectorate rested on my shoulders. And then suddenly, everything that had been built over years and years began to quake, rattling like a flimsy hangar on a seismically active world."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de bildiğim her şeyi geride bıraktım, ailem yerine koyduklarımı bile. Atalarımın ataları dahi subaydı, bense bu akıl almaz maceraya girişmeyi seçtim. Lord Kaptan Theodora, uğraşmak için vakit bulamadığı tüm meselelerini bana emanet ederdi. Sancak gemisinin başında, uzaklarda, gözlem seferlerinde uzun günler geçirirdi. Koca protektoranın terakkisinden ben sorumluydum. Sonra yıllar boyunca inşa edilen onca şey birden sallanmaya, deprem bölgesinde zar zor ayakta duran birer bina gibi sarsılmaya başladı."
